SML_ReinitDrive (FB)
SML_ReinitDrive (FB)
Â¶
FUNCTION_BLOCK SML_ReinitDrive
Reinitializes an axis.  The startup-phase of the axis is executed again.
InOut:
Scope
Name
Type
Comment
Inout
Axis
Axis_REF_SML
Reference to the axis
Input
bExecute
BOOL
Rising Edge: The reinitialization is started
Output
bDone
BOOL
The reinitialization is finished
bBusy
BOOL
The FB is not finished and new output values are to be expected
bError
BOOL
An error has occured
eError
SML_ERROR
Error number

rows.Name: bExecute
rows.Comment: Rising Edge: The reinitialization is started

rows: The FB is not finished and new output values are to be expected
